## MultiObserver.Watch() method

Raise a callback when one of the observable will notify

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Watch<T>(observables: Observable<T>[], callback: (eventData: T, eventState: ObserverEventState) => void, mask?: number, scope?: any): MultiObserver<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  observables | <code>Observable&lt;T&gt;[]</code> | defines a list of observables to watch |
|  callback | <code>(eventData: T, eventState: ObserverEventState) =&gt; void</code> | defines the callback to call on notification |
|  mask | <code>number</code> | defines the mask used to filter notifications |
|  scope | <code>any</code> | defines the current scope used to restore the JS context |

<b>Returns:</b>

`MultiObserver<T>`

the new MultiObserver
